title.narrative: Helpdesk to assist UK Government staff with expertise to improve policy and programming in respect of violence against women and girls

description.narrative: This activity (Helpdesk to assist UK Government staff with expertise to improve policy and programming in respect of violence against women and girls) is a component of Violence Against Women and Girls: Country Support reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £1,424,549. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Ending violence against women and girls. , with the following implementing partners: Social Development Direct Limited. The start date is 01-04-2015 and the end date is 31-07-2020.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

sector.narrative: Ending violence against women and girls

description.narrative: Aggregated spend of less than £500 - Financial Year 2018 Quarter 2
